'''Marvel Guardians of the Galaxy Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140802173001/http://playxbla.com/marvel-guardians-of-the-galaxy-skin-pack-for-minecraft-xbox-360-edition/|title=Marvel Guardians Of The Galaxy Skin Pack For Minecraft Xbox 360 Edition|website=playxbla.com}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] containing 24 skins of characters from the superhero film ''{{Wikipedia|Guardians of the Galaxy (film)|Guardians of the Galaxy}}'' by {{Wikipedia|Marvel Studios}}, as well as the comic series of the same name, and was available on [[Legacy Console Edition]]s for Xbox consoles until December 21, 2015. Due to the [[Better Together Update]], it was added {{in|be}} on September 12, 2017, although it is only available to players who owned it already when they migrated from Legacy Console Edition.<ref>{{Mcnet|new-marketplace-space-sports-and-dinosaurs|New on Marketplace: Space, Sports and Dinosaurs|September 21, 2017|Tom Stone}}</ref>
